original: Laurell, Ingrid Äline, telegrafkom-missarie, Vetlanda, f. 23/1/85 i Asker, Örebro L, av major K. A. Laurell o. Maria Pettersson. — Avg:ex. v. Alingsås flicksk. 00, Upps. ensk. läroverks sjunde kl. 01. E. o. telegrafist 02, ord. dito i Gävle 08, i Upps. 09, te-legrafikommiss. i Robertsfors 16, i Vetlanda sed. 35. Styr :led. i Robertsfors kyrkl. miss rkrets 27-31, init:tag. t. samt styr :led. 25-34 i Robertsfors hus-modersfören., ordf. i Bygdeå moderata kvinnofören. samt led. av kyrko-o. kommrfullm. i Bygdeå s :n 32-34, styr:led. i Vetlanda lokalfören. av Vita Bandet sed. 41, led. av Finl :komm, i Vetlanda 42-43. GMnr.
translated: Laurell, Ingrid Äline, telegraph commissioner, Vetlanda, b. January 23, 1885 in Asker, Örebro county, daughter of Major K.A. Laurell and Maria Pettersson. - Graduated from Alingsås girls' school in 1900, Uppsala private high school in 1901. Assistant telegraphist in 1902, regular telegraphist in Gävle in 1908, in Uppsala in 1909, telegraph commissioner in Robertsfors in 1916, in Vetlanda since 1935. Board member in the Robertsfors parish mission circle from 1927 to 1931, initiator and board member of the Robertsfors housewives' association from 1925 to 1934. Chairperson of the Bygdeå Moderate Women's Association and member of the church and municipal council in Bygdeå parish from 1932 to 1934. Board member of the Vetlanda local branch of the White Ribbon since 1941, member of the Finnish committee in Vetlanda from 1942 to 1943. Married.

memberOf.name: Bygdeå s:n
memberOf.roleName: Member of Church and Municipal Council
